mapper.sql: t1.id as "id", t1.type as "type", t1.description as "description", t1.date_created as "dateCreated", t1.create_id as "createId", t1.create_ip as "createIp"
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user_log( id, type, description, date_created, create_id, create_ip ) values ( #{id}, #{type}, #{description}, now(), #{createId}, #{createIp} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE type=VALUES(type) ,description=VALUES(description)

insert into t_sys_user_log( id, type, description, date_created, create_id, create_ip ) values
( #{t.id}, #{t.type}, #{t.description}, now(), #{t.createId}, #{t.createIp} )
mapper.select: select count(0) from t_sys_user_log where id = #{id}

select
from t_sys_user_log t1 where 1=1
and t1.description like CONCAT('%',#{description},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.date_created,'%Y-%m-%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{dateBegin},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.date_created,'%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{dateEnd},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by t1.date_created desc

select
from t_sys_user_log t1 where 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.date_created,'%Y-%m-%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{dateBegin},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.date_created,'%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{dateEnd},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by t1.date_created desc
